conditions.short_description: The snowpack has become isothermal many places and stable in the mild weather last days
conditions.full_description: The snowpack has become isothermal many places and stable in the mild weather last days

area_forecast.forecast: The snow has settled and strengthened in the mild weather over the past few days.
area_forecast.snow_condition: In recent days, the snow has settled and strengthened in the mild weather. There is still snow in the mountains after snowfall in early March, and small wind slabs can likely be found on top of hard snow at higher elevations. The snow is expected to continue strengthening in the mild weather over the coming days.
area_forecast.weather: Áfram má búast við mildu veðri, stöku skúrum og sunnanáttum næstu daga.

area_forecast.forecast: Snow has subsided in warm weather and is generally isothermal. It should continue to strengthen in mild weather.
area_forecast.recent_avalances: Wet slab in Naustahvilft 19th of mars
area_forecast.snow_condition: Mild weather with little precipitation is expected in the coming days, so the snow should continue to settle and strengthen over time. Avalanches may occur in isolated gullies where wind slabs may still be still present, especially during warming and when in the direct sun.
area_forecast.weather: S átt og breytileg, milt veður og lítilsháttar rigning.

area_forecast.forecast: Snow has settled in warm and sunny weather the recent days, but older wind slabs might still remain at higher elevations.
area_forecast.snow_condition: Diurnal fluctuations are affecting the snowpack these days. Some softer snow or old wind slabs can be found in gullies and depressions at higher elevations. The past few days have been warm and sunny, leading to wet loose avalanches. Blowing snow occurred in the mountains on Monday, possibly accumulating in east-facing aspects. Loose snow or small wet avalanches may occur where the sun reaches and due to warming temperatures.
area_forecast.weather: S-læg átt og rigning, kólnar á föstud. og snýst í N-læga átt á laugard. með éljum

area_forecast.forecast: Little or no snow at low elevations and hard packed snow in the mountains. Softer snow is present in ravines and depressions.
area_forecast.snow_condition: Little or no snow is at low elevations and hard packed snow is in the mountains. Small slabs could persist in places in high elevations.
area_forecast.weather: Fremur hæg breytileg átt, Þurrt að mestur og milt veður.

weather_forecast.forecast: S-winds with rain on the West Coast, colder weather on Thursday in the west but increasing rain at South Coast
